summary: Six bank robbers trying to pull off the perfect heist discover one of them is an undercover cop.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Sanjay Dutt|Sunil Shetty|Mahesh Manjrekar|Lucky Ali|Kumar Gaurav|Namrata Singh Gujral|Malaika Arora|Rati Agnihotri|Isha Koppikar|Ranjit Chowdhry|Jeff Davis|Morgana Di Castlebesozza|Sanjay Sippy|Gilbert Aguilera|Ike Bram|Aslam Khan|Kurt Sinclair|Chris Chudney|Nils Allen Stewart|Jim Nelson|Deya Simone|Peter Esquivel|Lucas Burke|Ajay Vidure|Michelle Deangekus|Sterling Moore|Rebecca Ritz|Nathaniel McClure|Ted Richard|Arnie Alpert|James Allen Bradley|Shannon Green|Christina Jupinko|Marcy McCusker|Maysen Michaels|Tiffany Shepis|Gulshan Grover|Rohit Roy
title: Kaante
